name: UpdateAirtableTable
description:
Update the properties of an Airtable table.

Use this tool to update the name, description, or date dependency settings of a specific Airtable table identified by its base ID and table ID or name.

parameters.name: airtable_base_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Airtable base containing the table to update.

parameters.name: table_id_or_name
parameters.description: The identifier or name of the table to update in Airtable.

parameters.name: table_update_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object containing the new properties for the table, such as name, description, and date dependency settings.

durationFieldId.description: Must be an editable number field with unit in days.

endDateFieldId.description: Must be an editable Date field.

holidays.description:
Set of holidays dates to skip when recalculating. Each date should be ISO-formatted.
Has no effect if shouldSkipWeekendsAndHolidays is false.

isEnabled.description: Whether the date dependency settings are enabled.

predecessorFieldId.description: If present, must be an editable linked record field pointing to the same table.

reschedulingMode.description:
Determines how tasks are rescheduled relative to their predecessors.
[See support article](https://support.airtable.com/docs/date-dependencies-in-airtable#supported-date-dependency-behavior-in-airtable) for more.

shouldSkipWeekendsAndHolidays.description: Whether to skip weekends and holidays when recalculating.

startDateFieldId.description: Must be an editable Date field.

dateDependencySettings.description: Configuration for a table's date dependency settings.

description.description: The new description for the table (optional). If present, must be a string no longer than 20,000 characters.

name.description: The new name for the table (optional).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the airtable API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
